title: The Courageous Week of Alice Watson, Hero Counselor
summary: Alice Watson, a 37-year-old counselor and teacher, discovers her ability to absorb fears and anxieties from others and uses it to fight a looming darkness in her city over a week.
summaryGerman: Alice Watson, eine 37-jährige Beraterin und Lehrerin, entdeckt ihre Fähigkeit, Ängste und Sorgen von anderen zu absorbieren und verwendet diese, um eine drohende Dunkelheit in ihrer Stadt über eine Woche hinweg zu bekämpfen.
summaryDutch: Alice Watson, een 37-jarige counselor en leraar, ontdekt haar vermogen om angsten en zorgen van anderen te absorberen en gebruikt dit om een dreigende duisternis in haar stad gedurende een week te bestrijden.
summaryFrench: Alice Watson, une conseillère et enseignante de 37 ans, découvre sa capacité à absorber les peurs et les anxiétés des autres et l'utilise pour lutter contre une obscurité menaçante dans sa ville pendant une semaine.

story.text: Alice feels a sudden surge of energy as she comforts a distraught student, inadvertently absorbing the student's anxiety. She finishes the day feeling strangely energetic and empowered.
Empowered by her new ability, Alice helps a group therapy session end with everyone feeling unusually peaceful. She starts to suspect her power might be real.
Alice prevents a fight at school by calming a furious parent, noticing her ability also lessens anger in others. Late night, her peaceful neighborhood seems disturbingly eerie.
Investigating the eerie feeling, Alice encounters a shadowy figure emanating despair. She confronts it, using her power to disperse the darkness, feeling a mix of fear and excitement.
After a restless night, Alice learns of increased calmness in her city. Inspired, she decides to train and refine her ability to help even more people.
During a city meeting about recent improvements in communal mental health, Alice privately counsels the mayor, ensuring his support.
Alice spends a peaceful day reflecting on her heroics, ensuring she remains grounded and ready to teach the coming week. She feels part of something much larger and more important.

ending: Thus ends the week where Alice Watson became not only a hero to her city, but also to herself.
moral: Even the smallest acts of kindness can wield great power over darkness.
